title: President expresses grief over demise of Mufti Abdul Shakoor
content:
ISLAMABAD, Apr 15 (APP): President Dr. Arif Alvi Saturday expressed grief over the demise of Minister for Religious Affairs Mufti Abdul Shakoor in a traffic accident.
In a message, the President paid tribute to the late minister for his services for inter-faith harmony.
While sympathizing with the family of Mufti Abdul Shakoor, the President prayed for the departed soul and for the grant of fortitude to the bereaved.
